paper.title: A Big Data Technique for Internet Financial Risk Control
paper.abstract: The danger of losing funds on an investment or business enterprise is referred to as financial risk. Credit risk, liquidity risk, and operational risk are some of the most prevalent and different financial hazards. Financial risk control is an organizational activity that seeks to detect, monitor, and manage exposure to different risks associated with the usage of financial services. Conventional accounting risk control has relatively great timeliness and unpredictability; therefore, traditional accounting risk identification has numerous difficulties, such as high error rate, low precision, lengthy time, and risk. As a result, this research provides a unique financial risk control strategy in the Internet environment based on big data. First, the decision tree algorithm is used to classify the users who can face financial risks. Simultaneously, the user's personal credit information is established and represented mathematically, and the 5C mathematical model is obtained. In this way, the user's credit degree can be judged more accurately, and the user's credit rating can be obtained, allowing quantitative analysis of users to be realized. Second, construct and weight the financial risk system index of the Internet in accordance with the existing financial system. Finally, the Internet financial risk control model based on big data is built, and the financial risk early warning threshold range is determined to achieve Internet financial risk control. The experimental findings reveal that the method's risk identification error rate is minimal, accuracy is high, and control time is quick. It can match the actual risk level, which shows that the control effect of this method is good.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是基于大数据的金融风险控制方法，包括使用决策树算法对用户进行信用评级和风险分类，以及构建金融风险系统指标和预警模型。这些内容明确指向金融风险管理领域，特别是信用风险和操作风险的管理。
